pull.title: chainparams: use SeedSpec6's rather than CAddress's for fixed seeds
pull.body: More work on removing app/boost dependencies from chainparams. This drops the need for netbase and greatly simplifies seed data storage.

events.message:
chainparams: use SeedSpec6's rather than CAddress's for fixed seeds

This negates the need for CAddress here at all

issue.title: Tracking: Backport upstream network encapsulation
issue.body:
This is to track the backporting of various upstream PRs leading up to the goal of the P2P network encapsulation:
